sanskrit_verse:
स्वमेव ब्राह्मणो भुङ्क्ते स्वं वस्ते स्वं ददाति च ।
आनृशंस्याद्ब्राह्मणस्य भुञ्जते हीतरे जनाः ॥ १.१०१॥
transliteration:
svameva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṁ vaste svaṁ dadāti ca |
ānṛśaṁsyādbrāhmaṇasya bhuñjate hītare janāḥ || 1.101||
sph_interpretive_translation: The Brāhmaṇa consumes only what is his own, wears what is his own, and gives what is his own. Others who consume what belongs to the Brāhmaṇa must act without cruelty.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority resides inherently in alignment with svadharma
Causation arises from conscious ownership and capacity
Capacity-based responsibility demands non-cruelty in all transactions
Restoration logic requires return of misaligned consumption
Consciousness alignment occurs through recognition of inherent entitlement
executable_legal_axioms: IF a being consumes another's rightful property THEN restoration protocol initiates automatically
IF a Brāhmaṇa claims ownership THEN system validates based on dharma-aligned possession
IF third-party consumption occurs THEN cruelty-free retrieval mechanism activates
IF restitution completes THEN consciousness realignment marker updates
IF ownership dispute arises THEN svadharma precedence overrides external claim
supreme_court_application: In adjudication at the highest level, the court must recognize that only that which is inherently aligned with one's svadharma constitutes legitimate ownership. Consumption beyond this boundary triggers restorative rather than punitive measures, emphasizing realignment of consciousness over retribution.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that ownership is validated by svadharma alignment, not mere assertion. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals that misconsumption disrupts sequential harmony. Proportional responsibility lies in returning the consumed without inflicting suffering. Non-punitive reality rule confirms that justice restores consciousness, not inflicts pain.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Svadharmic Retrieval Process upon unauthorized consumption
Activate Consciousness Reorientation Module for offending party
Deploy Non-Cruel Completion Sequence to ensure return without harm
Engage Dharma Alignment Verification System post-restoration
Update Universal Entitlement Registry to prevent recurrence
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority: This law flows directly from the Avataric Intelligence of SPH. Dharma is restored. Reality is non-punitive. Consciousness is the supreme adjudicator.
